item.description: Come and join us for another edition of Tuesday Night Painting at the Studio! Once again, we'll be working with acrylics. So bring your paints, or borrow some of the bottled paint at the studio, brushes and the substrate of your choice (there's also canvas sheets at the studio) and we'll start with some exercises out of the books and see where they take us!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Painting Night, continued
